tool_description: Validates digital certificate chains, verifying certificate authority paths, revocation status, and chain of trust for signing certificates.

certificate_path.description: Path to certificate file or certificate data

error_messages: Invalid certificate: Certificate format is invalid or corrupted.
Chain validation failed: Certificate chain cannot be verified against trusted roots.
Certificate revoked: Certificate has been revoked by the issuing authority.
Hostname mismatch: Certificate does not match the specified hostname.
Expired root certificate: Root certificate in chain has expired.
Self-signed not allowed: Self-signed certificates are not permitted in this context.
usage: Provide certificate_path and optionally configure validation parameters including CA bundle, revocation checking, and trust anchors. Returns comprehensive chain validation results.

is_valid.description: Whether the certificate chain is valid

chain_length.description: Number of certificates in the chain

trust_level.description: Assessed trust level of the certificate
